note: This file contains metadata for the Economic Architecture - Brookings mapping collaboration. Note that the 'ids' field is a list of unique record IDs that correspond to the [1] unique ID assigned to each innovator as well as to the [2] filename containing data for that innovator. E.g. the data for innovator 'id1' should be contained in a file named 'id1.json'. Adding ids to this list will automatically add them to the map, assuming the corresponding data file exists in the 'data' directory.

lonlat.label: Coordinates
lonlat.description: Longitude and latitude of the organization in the format [lon, lat]. Not displayed to the user.
